_header: Madame when you are disposed to pray
Subjects: lovers, addresses to beloved; lover’s plea

BLAdd17012.Transcription:
Madame wan you ar dysposed to prayremember your assured sarvant
                    alway
BLAdd17012.Editions:
Wordsworth,  Charles,  and  Henry Littlehales.  
             The Old Service Books of the English Church.
         London: 1904: 62.
